types:type.name: jsonDataType
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type jsonDataType = {| orderId: String, processingDate: String, processingTime: String, noOfRecords: String, records: Array<{| name: String, contactNo: String, emailId: String |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"orderId\\\":\\\"AB123\\\",\\\"processingDate\\\":\\\"061222\\\",\\\"processingTime\\\":\\\"1237\\\",\\\"noOfRecords\\\":\\\"2\\\",\\\"records\\\":[{\\\"name\\\":\\\"xyz\\\",\\\"contactNo\\\":\\\"9876543210\\\",\\\"emailId\\\":\\\"test@inveniolsi.com\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"abc\\\",\\\"contactNo\\\":\\\"9876543211\\\",\\\"emailId\\\":\\\"test123@inveniolsi.com\\\"}]}"}
